history.proof: qsimpl time: 1 use: changement_base_cocyclique_2. qsimpl time: 1 use: changement_base_cocyclique_2,abba.

ctx: intros A B C D H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment A, B, C, D : PO H1 : orthogonal (vec C A) (vec C B) H2 : orthogonal (vec D A) (vec D B) The term "A" has type "PO" while it is expected to have type "~ colineaire (vec ?C ?A) (vec ?C ?B)".

ctx: intros A B C D H1 H2.
intros A B C D H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall A B : PO, R (cons (vec A B) (vec B A)) pi" on hypothesis of type "R (double (cons (vec D A) (vec D B))) pi".

original: intros A B C D H1 H2. apply (changement_base_cocyclique_2 A B C D). - intro HC. unfold orthogonal in *. apply abba in H2. contradiction. - unfold orthogonal in *. apply double_permute in H1. apply (double_permute (vec C A) (vec C B) (vec D A) (vec D B)) in H2. apply H2.
